name: The DtD Archives: Keyblade Index
description:
‘The DtD Archives’ is a personal fan project celebrating my love for the Kingdom Hearts franchise and my desire to develop my UI/UX design and programming skills. The premise is to showcase lore and info from the series in a more interesting and interactive way than a wiki would provide. This is an ongoing project, with the Keyblade Index page nearly completed as of now. 

-KH Icons collected by Televo: https://github.com/Televo/kingdom-hearts-recollection

Github Repo: https://github.com/WillyBeeCoding/The-DtD-Archives

('The DtD Archives' is not affiliated with Disney, SQUARE, and their collaborative products. The Kingdom Hearts™ franchise belongs to its developers SQUARE ENIX Co., Ltd.)
